beginner.title: Sum of Two Numbers
beginner.description: Write a function that takes two numbers and returns their sum.
hints: Start with a simple function definition
Don't forget to return the result

beginner.title: Reverse String
beginner.description: Write a function that reverses a string.

intermediate.title: Palindrome Checker
intermediate.description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome.
hints: Compare the string with its reverse
